title: New Signalling System Fault Near Ang Mo Kio

title_translations.zh-Hans: 宏茂桥附近新信号系统故障
title_translations.ms: Ralat Sistem Isyarat Baharu Berhampiran Ang Mo Kio
title_translations.ta: Ang Mo Kio அருகே புதிய சமிக்ஞை அமைப்பு தவறு

updates.text: [NSL]CLEARED: Train services btwn #MarinaSouthPier and #Yishun have resumed. Free regular bus and free bridging bus services have ended.
[NSL]UPDATE:Pls add 15mins train travel time between #MarinaSouthPier & #Yishun,due to a new signalling system fault.Train svc is available.
[NSL]UPDATE:Pls add 40mins train travel time between #MarinaSouthPier & #Yishun,due to a new signalling system fault.Train svc is available.
[NSL]UPDATE:Pls add 25mins travel time between #MarinaSouthPier & #Yishun,due to a signalling system fault.Train svc is available.
[NSL]: Due to a New Signalling System fault near Ang Mo Kio, pls add 20mins travel time btwn #Yishun & #Marina South Pier.
